item.title: Método de ejecución Agente C2
item.author: Antu
item.description: Execution method Agent C2 Introduction In this post I am going to describe a way how an attacker or members of a Red Team can elaborate a malicious file and be executed in the target machine in order to gain access without being detected by the antivirus. For this post I have used the Command and Control AdaptixC2, I will not go into depth on how to install it because in the documentation itself is well detailed the process.
